works.complaint:
We have had a number of issues with "customer service"
 
ads appearing on our key brand terms such as [sky], [sky tv] etc. These
ads  
are promoting themselves as if they are the Sky Services number, which  
firstly is miseleading and illegal but they also have high phone number  
rates so are taking advantage of customers.  This is potentially hugely  
damaging to our brand and highly concerning so we would like all instances
 
removed and monitored regularly.
